GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.17.13
GSD.description:
i2c: ismt: prevent memory corruption in ismt_access()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit fc2f9ee7568609adb68b1f55f0a4c182b09a47e7, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 5e9a97b1f4491b8b65874901ad084348fcaba327. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: i2c: ismt: prevent memory corruption in ismt_access()
OSV.details:
i2c: ismt: prevent memory corruption in ismt_access()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit fc2f9ee7568609adb68b1f55f0a4c182b09a47e7, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 5e9a97b1f4491b8b65874901ad084348fcaba327. For more details please see the references link.
